1167870.name: Pinball FX3 - Williams™ Pinball: Universal Monsters Pack
1167870.description:
Two scarily authentic Williams™ and Bally™ pinball tables—and a whole party of iconic Universal Monsters!—comprise this collection: MONSTER BASH™ and CREATURE FROM THE BLACK LAGOON. Both are available to play in their classic original form and as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

- MONSTER BASH: Reunite the creatures of the night and get ready to rock! Rebuild FRANKENSTEIN, dig out THE MUMMY, unleash a full moon for THE WOLFMAN, spell D-R-A-C-U-L-A, lure the CREATURE FROM THE BLACK LAGOON up from the slimy depths of his beloved lagoon, and get the BRIDE OF FRANKENSTEIN to wail about her ball and chain!
- CREATURE FROM THE BLACK LAGOON: All the excitement of Universal Studios' classic monster flick with the fun of a drive-in movie date! When nostalgia meets high-tech pinball wizardry, the results are breathtaking!
1167870.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
